A4.text: The ban on importing British lamb to the US was lifted in 2022 but the ban on food containing sheep lung remained in force.

A5.text: In 1971, it became illegal to import haggis into the US from the UK due to a ban on food containing sheep lung, which constitutes 10â€“15% of the traditional recipe.
